featured.text: If this works, huge numbers of elderly and disabled people can regain their personal mobility.

to help those who could not afford certain household items (B) to open a furniture store run by church volunteers (C) to teach people how to destroy disposable furniture (D) to sell good-quality furniture to disabled people 43.
What advice would Wesla most likely give other disabled people? (A) Ignore what you have lost and make the best use of what you have.
Many have been helped through the scheme, including single parents, disabled people and the elderly, and those who have lost all their household possessions through a disaster such as a house fire.

definition.zh_def: 無法正常運作或功能受限的狀態，通常指身體或心理上的障礙。
definition.en_def: Having a physical or mental condition that limits movements, senses, or activities.
definition.example: The community center offers various programs for disabled individuals.
